description:

“Hey, you don’t mind if I bottom do you?” Alexander asked politely.

“Of course not!” Jordan said. “It’s all you man... I’m usually the one bottoming anyway, so my ass could use a break!”

I could tell that Jordan was excited about getting to fuck. While he was going to town on Alexander’s ass I noticed that he kept looking down at his dick.

“It was a great view!” he said when I asked him about it later. “Watching my dick slide in and out was hot! It kept me hard as a rock!”
title: Alexander & Jordan: Bareback
